distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gnutls fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-16868: Fixed Bleichenbacher-like side channel leakage in PKCS#1 v1.5 verification (bsc#1118087).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Explicitly require libnettle 3.4.1 to prevent missing symbol errors (bsc#1134856).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15

notes.text: A Bleichenbacher type side-channel based padding oracle attack was found in the way gnutls handles verification of RSA decrypted PKCS#1 v1.5 data. An attacker who is able to run process on the same physical core as the victim process, could use this to extract plaintext or in some cases downgrade any TLS connections to a vulnerable server.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
